name: Ice Messenger
short_description:
Ice Messenger is a small Chat, where you talk about something with your friends our other people.
Ice Messenger you can allready use at your office and other places.
It has written in Java and so you can use it one all platforms which can use Java.
Here are a few:
Windows, Linux, Unix, Solaris, Macintosh and more.

This application is in the first version and so it has much of errors and other bugs!

Describe your bugs and errors in the forum.
